title: Earth Science: Our Planet in Space
description: A comprehensive overview of our planet and its place in the universe, covering geology, meteorology, oceanography, and astronomy.

lessons.title: Earth's Structure and Plate Tectonics
lessons.description: Identify Earth's layers and understand how plate movement causes earthquakes and volcanoes.

lessons.title: Rocks and the Rock Cycle
lessons.description: Learn about the three main types of rock and how they transform through the rock cycle.

lessons.title: The World's Oceans
lessons.description: Understand the role of oceans in climate regulation and learn about ocean currents and tides.
lessons.unit: Unit 2: The Fluid Earth - Oceanography & Meteorology

lessons.title: The Atmosphere and Weather
lessons.description: Identify atmospheric layers and understand how air pressure differences create weather patterns.
lessons.unit: Unit 2: The Fluid Earth - Oceanography & Meteorology

lessons.title: The Earth, Moon, and Sun System
lessons.description: Explore how Earth's tilt causes seasons, understand moon phases, and learn about eclipses.

lessons.title: The Solar System and Beyond
lessons.description: Journey through our solar system and understand the vast scale of the cosmos.
